person.content:

Paragraph: West Indies captain Courtney Walsh elected to bat after winning the toss in the first match in the World Series limited overs competition against Australia at the Melbourne Cricket Ground on Friday .

Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.
